results.content: Covering promises would have been great!
Great introduction and building concepts with understandable explanation and pace.
results.content_html: Great introduction and building concepts with understandable explanation and pace.

results.content: Great resource overall. Instructions could be a little slower and drawn out in his explanations but other than that a good supplemental course for learning node. It doesn't dive too deep but gives you the basics.
results.content_html: Great resource overall. Instructions could be a little slower and drawn out in his explanations but other than that a good supplemental course for learning node. It doesn't dive too deep but gives you the basics.

results.content:
I hit the ground running when I began learning my way around node.js and building my first projects.
Expectedly, I missed a bunch of stuff and/or didn't fully grasp the potential power of certain parts of the base API.

This great starter tutorial helped clear up some confusion and put a spotlight on some things i overlooked or completely missed.

results.content: Course is great however, lecturer is really fast sometimes and is necessary to redo it to get the concept and idea regarding subject.
